properties.title: Bikepark Crans-Montana
properties.abstract: Lots of flowing fun, steep wall curves, jumps and wooden bridges - the three trails of the Crans-Montana bike park are very varied and feature inspiring panoramic views of the Rhone valley.
properties.description:
In the Crans-Montana bike park, you can choose between different trails with a difference in altitude of up to 800 metres: the blue Merbé trail from Chetzeron to Arnouva is an ideal introduction to the world of downhill biking. However, since it combines all the elements of a great downhill run, advanced riders will be thrilled as well.  

The red trail "Mont Lachaux" is for those who want a little more adrenaline: steep curves, small jumps and root passages in a magnificent scenery guarantee lots of fun. The famous black run "Chetzeron" is only for experts: it is steep and contains technically challenging sections with stones and roots. 

The offer also includes two northshore zones and an agility park with various elements.

Trail length: blue (3 km), red (3 km) and black (2.5 km)
properties.name: Crans-Montana Tourisme & Congrès
